特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: The course will incorporate lectures about business practices, pair work for editing, and group discussions of business-related readings from the textbook.

第1回: Introduction to class policies. Goal setting using SMART Goals
第2回: Review and discuss SMART Goals. Summary writing & case study approach. Introduction to case study 1.
第3回: Introduction to business letter format. Discuss case study 1.
第4回: Review business letter. Introduction to case study 2.
第5回: Discuss case study 2. Compare business letter and business emails. Introduction to case study 3
第6回: Discuss case study 3. Students will practice writing business emails for various purposes. Introduction to case study 4.
第7回: Students will review  vocabulary and concepts covered in first half for midterm test. Review email etiquette. Explore SWOT concept. Discuss case study 4.
第8回: Midterm assessment. Continue SWOT concept. Students research which company to research and explain. Introduction to case study 5.
第9回: Business comparison, analysis continued. Students will present a draft of their SWOT findings. Introduction to writing CV and job hunting. Discuss case study 5.
第10回: Final version of SWOT or business comparison. Students will present their findings. Introduction to CV and job hunting. Introduction to case study 6
第11回: CV and cover letter process continued. Writing and formatting of CV. CV writing vocabulary.
第12回: Case study 6.  Students will discuss case study 6.  Preliminary feedback on CV and cover letter.
第13回: End of term test on vocabulary and concepts. Final preparation of CV and cover letter.
第14回: Students will conduct a mock-interview. Review CV and cover letter and business writing portfolio. Final class impressions. Goal review.

教科書/Required texts1: Global Leadership: Case Studies of Business Leaders in Japan, 2nd Ed.
